sentences.en: A mood of melancholy descended on us.
sentences.cn: 一种悲伤的情绪袭上我们的心头。
一阵极度的凄伤袭上她的心头.

sentences.en: All at once he fell into a state of profound melancholy.
sentences.cn: 他立即陷入无尽的忧思之中.

sentences.en: All at once I fell into a state of profound melancholy.
sentences.cn: 我立即陷入无限的愁思之中.

sentences.en: Feelings of infinite melancholy stole over him.
sentences.cn: 无限的哀情愁思向他悄悄袭来.

sentences.en: He fixed me with those luminous, empty eyes and his melancholy smile.
sentences.cn: 他笑容忧郁地凝视着我，闪亮的眼睛里空无一物。

sentences.en: He has a strain of melancholy in him.

sentences.cn: 他陷入深深的忧郁之中。

sentences.en: His face was lined and melancholy.
sentences.cn: 他的脸上起了皱纹,且很悲郁.

sentences.en: I was deeply aware of his melancholy as he stood among the mourners.
sentences.cn: 当他站在致哀的人群中时，我深深地体会到了他的忧伤。

sentences.en: In North China , however, it is particularly, limpid, serene and melancholy.
sentences.cn: 可是啊, 北国的秋, 却特别地来得清,来得静, 来得悲凉.

sentences.en: It was in these hours of the late afternoon that Tom Mulligan felt most melancholy.
sentences.cn: 傍晚这几个小时里，汤姆·马利根最为抑郁。

sentences.en: The general watched the process with an air of melancholy.
sentences.cn: 将军神情忧郁地望着队列经过。

sentences.en: The music suited her melancholy mood.
sentences.cn: 这音乐很适合她的伤感情绪。

sentences.en: The sad news disposed him to melancholy.
sentences.cn: 令人沮丧的消息使他心情忧伤.

sentences.en: The songs start soft and melancholy.
sentences.cn: 歌声轻柔而忧伤地响起。

words.tran_cn: 忧郁的；抑郁的；患忧郁症的

trans.tran_cn: 忧郁的，悲伤的，凄凉的，阴沉的
忧郁，悲哀，愁思，闷闷不乐
trans.tran_en: a feeling of sadness for no particular reason
